clipboard.monitor
Interface ClipboardMonitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractClipboardMonitor, AbstractWindowsClipboardMonitor
public interface ClipboardMonitor

A service that monitors the system clipboard for changes.

Author:
Philipp Kursawe

Method Summary
 void onChange(ClipboardEvent event)
          Called upon changes in the clipboard.
 void start()
          Starts the monitoring of the clipboard.
 void stop()
          Stops the monitoring of the clipboard.
 

Method Detail

start

void start()
Starts the monitoring of the clipboard. This method can be called multiple times. If the monitor was already started the call has no effect.

stop

void stop()
Stops the monitoring of the clipboard. This method can be called multiple times. If the monitor has already been stopped, then the call has no effect.

onChange

void onChange(ClipboardEvent event)
Called upon changes in the clipboard.

Parameters:
event - describing the change
